Package interfaces

Interface MuseumInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Museum
    public interface MuseumInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    The Museum has rooms inside it. Those rooms have paintings that can be stolen by the Ordinary Thieves of the Assault Party.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getRoomDistance​(int room)
      Getter for the distance to a room.
      int getRoomPaintings​(int room)
      Getter for the number of paintings in a room.
      int rollACanvas​(int assaultParty, int ordinaryThief)
      Roll a canvas.
      void setRooms​(int[] paintings, int[] distances)
      Sets the rooms of the museum.
      void shutdown()
      Sends the shutdown signal to the Museum.

    • Method Detail

      • rollACanvas

        int rollACanvas​(int assaultParty,
                int ordinaryThief)
         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Roll a canvas.
        Parameters:
        assaultParty - the identification of the Assault Party
        ordinaryThief - the identification of the Ordinary Thief
        Returns:
        the updated state of the Ordinary Thief
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the execution of the remote code failed

      • setRooms

        void setRooms​(int[] paintings,
              int[] distances)
       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Sets the rooms of the museum.
        Parameters:
        paintings - an array with the paintings of each room, where the index is its identification
        distances - an array with the distances to each room, where the index is the identification of the room
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the execution of the remote code failed

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Sends the shutdown signal to the Museum.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the execution of the remote code failed

      • getRoomDistance

        int getRoomDistance​(int room)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Getter for the distance to a room.
        Parameters:
        room - the identification of the room
        Returns:
        the distance to the room
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the execution of the remote code failed

      • getRoomPaintings

        int getRoomPaintings​(int room)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Getter for the number of paintings in a room.
        Parameters:
        room - the identification of the room
        Returns:
        the number of paintings in the room
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the execution of the remote code failed
